channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IN

item.title: Report X-2023080169
item.description:
Report X-2023080169

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-19
  • City: GREENWOOD
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE ARRIVED IN THE QA AREA AND UPON INSPECTION DEEMED A FULLY REGULATED HAZMAT. FURTHER INSPECTION CONCLUDED PACKAGE NOTICEABLY WET/TORN. CONTENTS INSIDE CONTAINED 2 X 5-LITERS PLASTIC BOTTLES OF CORROSIVE AND OXIDIZING LIQUID. BOTH BOTTLES FAILED INTERNALLY DUE TO LOOSEN BOTTLE CAPS. DescribePack: FAILED AT TOP BOTTLE CAPS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: ONCE PACKAGE WAS DEEMED A FULLY REGULATED HAZMAT, IT WAS SEGREGATED FROM ALL OTHER PACKAGES.

item.title: Report X-2023080167
item.description:
Report X-2023080167

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-19
  • City: GREENWOOD
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE ARRIVED IN THE QA AREA AND UPON INSPECTION DEEMED NOTICEABLE INADEQUATE PREPARATION FOR TRANSIT. FURTHER INSPECTION CONCLUDED 1 X 5-GAL METAL PAIL/CAN DENTED AND DAMAGED. INSIDE CONTENTS CONSIST OF FLAMMABLE LIQUID. ENTIRE PACKAGE DEEMED DAMAGED AND UNUSABLE GOODS. DescribePack: PACKAGE FAILED AT TOP CAP AND BODY CLOSURE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: ONCE PACKAGE WAS DEEMED A FULLY REGULATED HAZMAT, IT WAS SEGREGATED FROM ALL OTHER PACKAGES.

item.title: Report X-2023080092
item.description:
Report X-2023080092

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-26
  • City: HAMMOND
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: BOX WAS UNLOADED AND DUE TO IMPROPER HANDLING AND CAPS BEING TAPED INSIDE, THE CAPS FELL OFF AND CAUSED A SPILLAGE BOTH INSIDE THE PACKAGE AND OUTSIDE. DescribePack: LOOSE, CRACKED CAPS DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: AREA WAS CLOSED OFF, HAZMAT WAS CLEAN UP, AND ALL MATERIALS PLACED IN THE DRUM WITH THE HAZMAT

item.title: Report X-2023080068
item.description:
Report X-2023080068

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-26
  • City: NEW HAVEN
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA ALERTED TO LEAKING HAZMAT AROUND 5 AM. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION, PACKAGE WAS PREVIOUSLY RTS'D DUE TO BEING AN IMPROPER HAZMAT. PACKAGE WAS NOT SHIPPED AS A HAZMAT AS IT SHOULD HAVE BEEN. NO DOT LABELS OTHER THAN THE STANDARD DIAMOND LABEL. NO HAZMAT PAPERWORK PROVIDED EITHER. THE PACKAGE HAD WENT OVERHEAD, AND SPILLED IN THE CHUTE AND ON THE FLOOR, APPROX. 2 CUPS OF LIQUID RESIN SPILLED. PACKAGE CONTAINED 2 METAL CANS OF PRIMER RESIN (APPROX 3.75 GAL OF RESIN TOTAL), NEITHER CAN HAD CLIPS TO SECURE THE LIDS. CLEANUP INCLUDED GLOVES AND ABSORBENT PADS. PACKAGE TAKEN AWAY FROM WORK AREA AND SET IN FRONT OF QA CAGE TO BE WORKED. DescribePack: 2 CANS NO CLIPS. 1 LID HAD BECOME LOOSE, LEAKING CONTENTS. BOTH CANS HAD ALSO BEEN DENTED NEAR THE LID. ONE CAN HAD A SMALL DENT, OTHER HAD A MEDIUM DENT DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: IMMEDIATELY SET ABSORBENT PADS ON THE SPILLED LIQUID TO PREVENT SLIPPAGE. PACKAGE TAKEN AWAY FROM WORK AREA TO PREVENT INHALATION

item.title: Report X-2023070318
item.description:
Report X-2023070318

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-12
  • City: BLOOMINGTON
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE DUE TO FROST FORMING ON THE OUTER BOX AND WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED DRY ICE PELLETS SURROUNDING A STYROFOAM COOLER CONTAINING UNKNOWN SPECIMEN SAMPLES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2023071131
item.description:
Report X-2023071131

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-17
  • City: GREENWOOD
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE ARRIVED IN THE QA AREA AND UPON INSPECTION DEEMED NOTICEABLY WET AND A FULLY REGULATED HAZMAT. FURTHER INSPECTION CONCLUDED CONTENTS INSIDE CONSISTED OF 2 RAPICIDE PA PART A (FULLY REGULATED) AND 2 RAPICIDE PART B (NON-HAZ) THAT LEAKED INTERNALLY DUE TO LOSE BOTTLE CAPS. 2X5 LITERS OF PART A FAILED CAUSING ENTIRE PACKAGE TO FAIL. DescribePack: FAILED AT TOP CAPS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: ONCE PACKAGE WAS DEEMED A FULLY REGULATED HAZMAT IT WAS SEGREGATED FROM ALL OTHER PACKAGES.
